flawed_nl_solution:
She averaged 32 points per game because 345 / 15 = <<345/15=32>>32
She averaged 10 points a game off two-point baskets because 5 x 2 = 10
She averaged 4 points a game from free throws because 4 x 1 = <<4*1=4>>4
She averaged 14 points a game off non-three point baskets because 10 + 4 = <<10+4=14>>14
She averaged 18 points from three-pointers because 32-14 = <<32-14=18>>18
She averaged 6 three-pointers a game because 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 32. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
